price: Ìbùkún ni fún Ẹni tí Ó ni ìjọba àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀ àti ohunkóhun tó wà láààrin méjèèjì. Ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ sì ni ìmọ̀ Àkókò náà wà. Ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀ sì ni wọ́n máa da yín padà sí.
arabic: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: watabāraka alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā waʿindahu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
